queries.description: Fetch catalog with available dimensions and measures
queries.query: query CatalogDimensions($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId) { dimensions { name description } measures { name description } limits { maxDays maxBuckets maxTopN } } }

queries.description: Fetch distinct team values for catalog
queries.query: query TeamValues($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId, dimension: TEAM) { values { value count } } }

queries.description: Fetch distinct repo values for catalog
queries.query: query RepoValues($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId, dimension: REPO) { values { value count } } }
